name: Magic Cauldron
description:
Click around to make things work! They don't work that well. However if you use the book, I know it's kinda hard to read, unless you are fullscreen. 
The reset, button doesn't fully work as it doesn't reset the cauldron progress.

Known issues:

  • The recipe is not 100% correct.
  • Some sounds don't play
  • You need to reload the page and restart the game if you mess up the cauldron progress
  • some of the physics is really wonky
  • The game is kinda random and easy
  • you can't lose

    I wish I could have more time for this one. However a submission must occur so here is my stuff! This game turned into a weird game and it's not fully explained in-game what to do.

    All stuff is solo made by me, as usual.
